categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: This skirmish took place on Drunost, when Bargleg swoopgang, which was allied with BloodScar pirates, tried to seize a weapons shipment that was being smuggle through Consolidated Shipping hub by Rebel operatives. The Rebels—who were masquerading as simple farmers—were rescued by a group of stormtrooper deserters. The stormtroopers destroyed the swoopgang and allowed the apparent farmers to go on their way—later they delivered their weapons to the Rebellion—before leaving the planet in a hurry.
